Generate Php code that imports the required libraries and creates a set of data model classes for an OpenAPI (v3) specification schema using the `spatie/data-transfer-object` package (i.e., `Spatie\DataTransferObject\DataTransferObject`), mirroring the structure and fields shown below:

```python
from pydantic import BaseModel
from typing import TypeVar, generic
import json

class OpenAPI(BaseModel):
   title: str
   description: str
   version: str
   servers: List[Server]
   paths: dict[str, PathItem]
   definitions: dict[str, Definition]

class Server(BaseModel):
   url: str
   description: str
   variables: dict[str, Variable]

class PathItem(BaseModel):
   $ref: str
   get: dict[str, Operation]
   post: dict[str, Operation]
   put: dict[str, Operation]
   delete: dict[str, Operation]

class Operation(BaseModel):
   summary: str
   description: str
   responses: dict[int, Response]

class Response(BaseModel):
   status_code: int
   description: str
   content: dict[str, MediaType]

class
```
